name: Sample Case 4: Multiple Red Flags - Severe Re-aging
description: A de-identified example showing multiple timeline inconsistencies indicating severe debt re-aging.
raw_text:
COLLECTION ACCOUNT

Furnisher: AGGRESSIVE RECOVERY LLC
Original Creditor: OLD BANK CORP
Account Type: Collection

Date Account Opened: 11/20/2024
Last Reported: 12/01/2024
Account Status: Open Collection

Original Amount: $1,200
Current Balance: $2,875

No DOFD Listed

Scheduled to remain until: 11/2031

Reported by: TransUnion
notes: This sample shows multiple red flags: (1) No DOFD is reported on a collection account, (2) A very recent date opened (2024), (3) Removal date 7 years from open date rather than DOFD, (4) Balance has more than doubled from original amount. This pattern is consistent with debt re-aging.
